title: "Pokemon Shirt Sizing" Concept Movie

alternative_titles.ja: 「ポケモンシャツ サイジング」コンセプトムービー

synopsis:
From "Pokemon shirts" made by freely combining Pokemon patterns, "Pokemon shirt sizing", a body measurement service using a smartphone, is now available! A concept movie is now available to help you understand more about the service!

A certain trainer tries to measure Pikachu in order to give him a shirt, but it seems like he's having a hard time.
At the end of the video, the secret of the "Pokemon shirt" logo is revealed?

Please pay attention to Pikachu's cute behavior.

(Source: Pokemon official YouTube channel; translated)
